titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation by her Maiesties commandement, for bidding the making or forging of any iron ordonance, aboue the quantitie of the piece commonly called the minion, without the Queenes speciall licence and prohibiting also the cariage out of the realme to any forraine parts, of any maner of ordonance of brasse or iron, vpon the paines hereafter conteined in the proclamation.
Proclamations. 1592-09-11
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Proclamations. 1592-09-11

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
